website_summaries.verdict: An affordable, lightweight, and all-around comfortable dive sock to keep your toes toasty while you’re swimming, scuba diving, or snorkeling.
cons: This dive sock rides fairly high on your shin, as opposed to most other models

customer_reviews.title: those neoprene socks work great 👍👍👍
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding! My wife and I went hiking the “Narrow” in Zion National Park in April, those neoprene socks work great 👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: MDG

customer_reviews.title: Size Down for a snug fit!
customer_reviews.text: I'm an 8 1/2 narrow and I wanted something that would fit my foot better. I'm a surfer and I like a snug fit so I won't slip around. I used the size chart and it says I'm a medium so I got the medium. Yes, it fits but its not snug and there's still some room at my toe, so I'll try ordering the small (its hard having narrow feet!) These are decently warm but not as warm as my Billabongs, but then the price is way less. I'll probably love these for the summer but they're not warm enough for winter (I run cold though).
customer_reviews.author: Sirena Pendragon

customer_reviews.title: Best way to keep your feet warm in the water with or without a shoe on top
customer_reviews.text: These wetsuit socks were the perfect addition to my trekking pack for a trip across Iceland. Having to cross icy cold rivers barefoot or with sandals is no fun and not safe. I paired these wetsuit socks with some water shoes and was solid on every river crossing. I stood in the river comfortably for about 5 minutes. The Large size was a perfect fit for my size 11-11.5 feet and they were low profile enough to fit right into my shoe. Incredible comfortable. I bought 2 pairs and my nephew was also comfortable with his size 10.5 feet. He used the socks alone to cross the river and did just fine. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Marylena

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and warm
customer_reviews.text: These are my first pair of neoprene socks; purchased for hiking in cold streams while in Utah and Arizona during November. They were perfect! Your feet don’t stay dry while wearing these, but rather wet and warm. I was surprised how comfortable I was wearing these with a pair of Keen shoes while trudging through ankle-deep water for many hours. I wear a size 12 shoe and the XL sock was just right.
customer_reviews.author: ToddDominey

customer_reviews.title: Keeps feet warm!
customer_reviews.text: Used for body boarding in in 60 degree water and I was totally fine temperature-wise. Didn't fall off and not TOO tight(I used sizing chart). Filled with water like I was walking with water balloons on feet when I came OUT of the water, but fine while IN the ocean
customer_reviews.author: Jeanthe

customer_reviews.title: ok sock if in warm water
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this sock because i needed to put a dock on the water in May when it is still chilly. I was in the water for 90 minutes, i would say the comfort lasted about an hour, then my toes were freezing, water did get into the sock within minutes, filling it and having large pockets in my feet to walk with. It was ok for what i needed it for, but i thought it would have protected my feet more.
customer_reviews.author: MoCat

customer_reviews.title: Performed well. Kept feet warm. Very durable.
customer_reviews.text: Wore these on my 11 mile hike through Zion Narrows. They performed excellent! They kept my feet warm the entire time. Very durable even when scuffed up against rocks. They do fit tight, so if you have thicker ankles/ calves...they can dig into your skin. Luckily I am 5’1 and the small fit perfect. I did have to take the insoles out of my shoes - as they are a thicker material...but they made up for the foot cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Yee Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Buy these now!
customer_reviews.text: OMG... these socks are amazing! Seriously, I cannot overstate their wonderfulness. I just got back from a week of snorkeling on Oahu and these socks were lifesavers. Well, not literally but they were outstanding. I had foot surgery in May ... big cuts along both sides of my feet with screws on both sides. I didn't even have the courage to try my fins on before we left. But thank God I ordered these. My foot slid into the fins easily and was cushioned and protected while snorkeling AND while walking on the beach! They went up high enough that no sand got in my socks... yeah!
customer_reviews.author: fdg

customer_reviews.title: These are a great addition to
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these socks in size S for my wonan's size 6 to 7 shoe size and used them from the day they arrived. I swim in the ocean year around and my feet get cold. These are a great addition to ,y winter gear
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Just received, tried on, snug fit which is good for insulation when water enters the weave. I wear a 10.5 shoe, have a narrow heel, bought a medium after debating between medium and large. Either likely would have been fine for kayaking. On my foot, the medium is hard to get on, but a little talc like divers use for donning wetsuits (same material) really eases the process. I gave no rating for warmth or durability yet, too early. Warmth should be no problem since it's made of wetsuit material with an excellent record for insulation. If worn inside a shoe, this design with a heel reinforcement should prove better than the designs with reinforcement/nonslip only on the sole.
customer_reviews.author: William P Sandifer Jr

customer_reviews.title: Warm feet at a good price
customer_reviews.text: These kept my feet warm even in the 42 degree river when I went rafting. They weren’t to snug but they did their job and I could walk around on pebbles. For the price I am very happy
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: The sole and toe resist wear. Most fin socks develop holes after a short time. The water here is cold. Holes suck. These are the best fin socks I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: lg66

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I wore these for a week in New Mexico while fly fishing. They were super comfortable and did the job. We hiked for hours back into the mountains to get to the lakes, and these socks held up well. I didn't have any sores or raw places on my feet, and the socks didn't show any signs of wear either. They dry out quickly by a camp fire and are ready to go the next day. Also - we caught more fish on this trip than ever before so... good luck charm maybe?
customer_reviews.author: Dave Snow

customer_reviews.title: Great overall.
customer_reviews.text: I love mine. I use them along with a wetsuit bodyboarding when I don’t feel like wearing booties. Some reviewers have mentioned them tearing; so, keep in mind that these are socks, like any sock, you shouldn’t be walking around on jagged rocks and shells with them. Use them as they are meant and you will love them!
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: They work.  I double up in winter
customer_reviews.text: I go to the lake daily. During winter i bought a wet suit for myself & daughter. The socks give out fast especially @ the herl... but i maybe hard on them. .. idk. Seems like i buy 4 packs a year... the ones with holes in the heels i use in summer
customer_reviews.author: jacqueline campbell

customer_reviews.title: These Ambidextrous Socks
customer_reviews.text: fit pretty good and snug at the toes. The water temp. has barely been below 70, so I've usually been wearing my anklets. I put my toes into this sock as far as possible and pull. The Large fits my 9.5 foot like a glove. I've only worn these twice this Winter, but I like 'em.
customer_reviews.author: WVU Alumnus in Florida

customer_reviews.title: Yep, feet stayed warm!
customer_reviews.text: I also got these for the narrows in Zion, as well as other canyon hikes and they did a great job keeping my feet warm. It was definitely weird to be walking in 40 degree water but still be warm. Neat technology! After a longer day walking through more sand, it did get inside the sock though.
customer_reviews.author: LeahNick

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit, easy to get on and off, warm, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Use them in Hiyak, kayak boots for warmth and they work well. Inside out or right side out. They dry overnight, seem to hold up well so far and are reasonably priced. Have not used them for walking by themselves. Without them in current temps can feel the cold after a while. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: JohnQ

customer_reviews.title: Helped my diabetic Dad exercise in the pool longer.
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my dad. He has diabetes and severe feet issues. These were warm enough and comfortable enough to let him stay in the pool two to three times longer than with bare feet.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Pearl

customer_reviews.title: Better than wearing shoes on a kayak in cold weather.
customer_reviews.text: Better than wearing shoes on a kayak in cold weather because if you flip you can swim in these easier. Keeps your feet dry when on icy terrain, small creeks or surf, or those large pools of urine. Matches my tuxedo pants perfectly when mom lets me go out on the town.
customer_reviews.author: StarPathOne

customer_reviews.title: Not durable at all - waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This is how this pair looks like after 3 days use - walking on a sandy beach. So unless you plan to use it in a pool - you will be better off with something else. Total waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Nataliya R.

customer_reviews.title: Warm. Delicate.
customer_reviews.text: Water Socks. Very warm and comfortable under swimfins. Soles wore out very quickly from walking on sand to get to the water. “Put them on at the waterline!” Nah- not barefootin’ it in sub 40 degree weather.
customer_reviews.author: Sight By Touch

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying.
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money. Got holes in them after one or two uses.
customer_reviews.author: Dahl Family

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is off but material is great
customer_reviews.text: I’m rating this a 4 as the sizing is a little off. I for a L for my husband who is a size 11-12 in men’s and this was way too small. It fits me perfect and I’m a size 7 in women’s. But the actual material is soft and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Kweber

customer_reviews.title: Fit great, not bulky like other neoprene socks
customer_reviews.text: Great water socks, fit really well in some hiking shoes that I took the insole out of. Certainly not bulky like most neoprene socks. I’m using them on the Narrows hike at Zion, will update then
customer_reviews.author: Rodney T

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy These!
customer_reviews.text: These only stayed waterproof for about 10 steps. Cheaply made and faulty product that does not perform. For this price buy the better quality for $5 more.
customer_reviews.author: mcarter

customer_reviews.title: Wore out
customer_reviews.text: First time using them, they wore out and got holes in them
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Surprised with how waterproof they are!
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely a great buy. I use them for snorkeling and they feel great, fit great, and keep my feet warm in cold water. I was also surprised because they're able to keep my feet dry unit I submerge the very top of the sock in water. It seems like the top of the sock is the only place where water can seep through since until that is submerged, the product is completely waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: They’re a bit thick for swimming.
customer_reviews.text: They feel like they drag too much. I wish they were thinner or more snug
customer_reviews.author: CeCe

customer_reviews.title: Great high quality affordable booties.
customer_reviews.text: I love my slinx 3mm booties. keep my feet toasty from low temp water and protect my feet from blisters using my diving fins.
customer_reviews.author: Seth R.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I had to try these for my mermaid tail due to the monofin creating blisters. Absolutely worth the buy. Will be getting these again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Good quality buy kne length
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable enough but if you don't watch tje water depth they fill up with water
customer_reviews.author: Donna longo

customer_reviews.title: Fit snugly
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 9 1/2 - 10 and I purchased the size 9. It fit snugly. I used it for my hike at the Narrows, Zion National Park in Utah. It worked. My feet were still cold, but it made the hike tolerable with these socks on.
customer_reviews.author: kristian

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my feet warm AND dry!
customer_reviews.text: Unlike most "sand socks" these actually keep my feet airtight and dry during fall sand volleyball! They are super tight to your skin so if you want, you can wear socks inside them for extra warms. They are AWESOME.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I went to the products website to look at size chart. I wear a womens size 8 1/2or 9 shoe. I ordered a size large and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: Kept my feet warm
customer_reviews.text: These did a great job keeping my feet warm while hiking the cold water in The Narrows of Zion Canyon. They also fit well into my trail running shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and durable
customer_reviews.text: My wife has used these socks on over 2 dozen warm water dives so far and she loves them. They are comfortable, prevented all chafing, and have not ripped or worn in any noticeable way so far.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for very cold weather for biking or running. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: RITA C

customer_reviews.title: Tough boot at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality rugged product. I wear a women’s 8.5 and bought the small. It was a perfect fit. These could double as a beach shoe.
customer_reviews.author: SLSmith

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Male, 71/2 to 81/2 shoe size, the small water sock fit my foot perfectly. Fits snug and is thin enough to wear with my keen water shoes. Like the grip texture on the toe and bottom. Got them to wear while kayaking.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Sizing Accurate
customer_reviews.text: This is a difficult item to size because of the material, but it was accurately described.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit eager to try out this spring FEEL GREAT AN FIT WELL
customer_reviews.author: william kessler

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and blister free while hiking
customer_reviews.text: Awesome socks. Used them for hiking and they were so comfy didn’t blister when walking in sand.
customer_reviews.author: McCall

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 recommend
customer_reviews.text: Wore these on my hike through The Subway at Zion in October. The water we waded through was freezing on my bare skin, but it kept my feet nice and warm! Hiked back through the subway in these for a total of 4 hours while they were wet and I had no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Michelle Ortega

customer_reviews.title: Excellent/Best Choice
customer_reviews.text: Best value, comfortable, easy on/off compared to many others (including those that ripped). I will recommend to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great deal
customer_reviews.text: Really keeps my feet warm in cold water! I wear them under booties with my wetsuit.
customer_reviews.author: ARK

customer_reviews.title: Decent booties, not entirely non-slip.
customer_reviews.text: These booties were sized accurately, But the soles could be thicker.
customer_reviews.author: catmom

customer_reviews.title: Great liner
customer_reviews.text: Works great for as a supplement for my kayak boots in cold water!
customer_reviews.author: Marilee

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my feet nice and warm to do water aerobics in an unheated outdoor pool. Temp 52
customer_reviews.author: Kayak  Momma

customer_reviews.title: looks like good quality, fits great
customer_reviews.text: quick shipment and the socks look and feel good. will be using them this summer on a backcountry trip.
customer_reviews.author: Jeri Blackwell

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of this product for the price
customer_reviews.author: Shari

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with them - used them in conjunction with wading ...
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with them - used them in conjunction with wading boots in the winter to surf fish.
customer_reviews.author: Freedom4Me

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Size small fit me perfectly (Size 6.5-7 women's US typically) and kept my feet warm when hiking through water in Arizona! Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit and feel great!
customer_reviews.text: Actually fit my feet perfectly (women's size 7.5) and are totally waterproof, surprisingly comfy!
customer_reviews.author: L Cates

customer_reviews.title: Good item good value
customer_reviews.text: I use these for wet wading in my Keen water shoes. Works great keeping gravel and sand out.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Cornu

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Like these found to be a little short in height up the calf but worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected and use them regularly when on the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Bonton

customer_reviews.title: Super warm
customer_reviews.text: I used my neoprene socks for doing laps in very cold water, they are easy to put on and keep my feet warm
customer_reviews.author: Jean Tawa

customer_reviews.title: Nice snug fit
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I’m a women’s size 7/7.5 street shoe with a narrow foot. The sole of my foot (per the sizing instructions) measured 24cm. I got the small size and they fit perfectly, nice and snug like socks. Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Oli

customer_reviews.title: They are adjusted
customer_reviews.text: They are tight, but not uncomfortable. Good for the sea, beach or rivers.
customer_reviews.author: Raul Hector Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Not durable for walking in
customer_reviews.text: Product ripped hole in bottom of sock within 2 weeks from waking around on concrete at local wakeboard cable park.
customer_reviews.author: Trey .M

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and kept me warm through some cold
customer_reviews.text: Fit well, comfortable and kept me warm through some cold water
customer_reviews.author: Samuel S Unger

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Used only 3 times and the stitching ripped neoprene. Going to have to glue it before it completely falls apart.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Hole in toe
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t last but a couple wears. Already have hole in toe.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Wear and tear
customer_reviews.text: They fit very well, only bad thing is i go hole in them very quickly just from walking in the beach sand
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: This Is not the right size.
customer_reviews.text: I was wanting them for longlasting thermal for my water shoes...
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Harlow

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They fit great and worked out well in the cold water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy way bigger than the sizing chart says
customer_reviews.text: Sizing is not correct. Way too small. Cannot even get on feet.
customer_reviews.author: andrew selby

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product - fits great, good insulation, good grip on the bottom. Five stars
customer_reviews.author: Amy Sheets

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Thought these would at least be semi water proof but water immediately comes through seams.....
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Great !!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are as form fitting as my daily socks (but obviously somewhat snugger), and the construction is first rate. The non-slip surface material appears much more durable than the 'standard' fin socks, and carries up the heel and over the toes, also. Tried them with my Mares full-foot fins, and they are a great fit, tightening the fit slightly, but feeling comfortably snug, no movement between foot & fin. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Kayakbob

product_meta.title: Neoprene Water Fin Sock Diving Wetsuits Sock 3MM for Women Men, Thermal Beach Sock Anti Slip Flexible for Snorkeling Surfing Kayaking Swimming Sailing Diving
product_meta.description:
There's no better way to enter the water than with Skyone wetsuits diving fin socks, Wrap yourself in pure Comfort and Performance, it can be fitted and adjusted all size available for men, women or kids in S, M, L, XL, please choose the size according to your feet length and reference to our size table image, However, due to everyone’s foot shape is difference and measuring tolerance ±2cm allowed, if you feel not fit for your size, simply contact with us freely and we will offer you a replacement or a refund, Click the 'Add to Cart' now! 

Neoprene Water Fin Sock Diving Wetsuits Sock 3MM for Women Men, Thermal Beach Sock Anti Slip Flexible for Snorkeling Surfing Kayaking Swimming Sailing Diving 

PRODUCT FEATURES:
Easy on easy off and anti-slip design
Durable and great Grip
Warm, lightweight and less water absorbs
Great gift set for mother, father, family, friends, lover
Material: Neoprene
Thickness: 3MM
Weight: 0.33lb (150g)
Size: S, M, L, XL (optional)
S: Suit for sole length 23-25cm(9.06-9.84inch), height 22cm(8.66inch), suitable for women 
M: Suit for sole length 24-26cm(9.45-10.24inch), height 22cm(8.66inch), suitable for men 
L: Suit for sole length 25-27cm(9.84-10.63inch), height 23cm(9.06inch), suitable for people with longer foot
XL: Suit for sole length 26-28cm(10.24-11.02inch), height 24cm(9.45inch), suitable for people with extra longer foot

PACKAGE INCLUDE:
1 Pair of Skyone Wetsuits Diving Sock
feature_bullets: ★COMFORTABLE FIT: Skyone wetsuits diving fin sock made with 3MM premium neoprene to give you a flexible and comfortable fit, you have less restrictions and less foot fatigue during water sports

★PROTECTION: With anti-slip design on sole and warm thermal materials to protect your foots from hurt by rocks or other sharp objects and keep warm while underwater, can be worn together with regular booties for added warmth in very cold water, just enjoy it

★WIDE APPLICATION: Hi-grip textured construction, wonderful for beach, snorkeling, swimming, scuba, surfing, sailing, kayaking, diving, perfect gift idea for mother, father, family, friends, lover...ect
★DURABLE: Glued and blind stitched for superior strength and durability, don’t worry about ripped, it will be a long term partner for you

★FULL COVERAGE: 150% high stretch and excellent recovery, can be fitted and adjusted all size available for men, women or kids in S, M, L, XL, please choose the size according to your feet length and reference to our size table image, However, due to everyone’s foot shape is difference and measuring tolerance ±2cm allowed, if you feel not fit for your size, please simply contact with us freely and we will offer you a replacement or a refund, Click the 'Add to Cart' now!
